description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The class declares four pure virtual methods designed to handle various OCI container events, each accepting a container name and a JSON object with event data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling OCI container lifecycle events such as start, stop, failure, and state changes.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Method invoked when an OCI container starts; accepts container name and related JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Method invoked when an OCI container stops; accepts container name and related JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Method invoked when an OCI container encounters a failure; accepts container name and related JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Method invoked when an OCI container's state changes; accepts container name and related JSON data.
